rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: "I have no idea why my daughter would contract bird flu because she [my daughter] never touched or ate the dead chickens," Chhuon Srey Mao said, "But I presume that she [my daughter] may have become infected with the virus [H5N1] when she [my daughter] played in the yard, as she [my daughter] normally did, where the chickens had been."
